p: Vinegar-processed C. phaeocaulis was prepared by the patented process, ‘The preparation of vinegar-processed C. phaeocaulis, ZL 2013 1 0400255.2’ (Liao et al. 2015). The detailed vinegar process is put the 30% 9° rice vinegar into suitable C. phaeocaulis for moistening 2 h and cook it until the rhizome of C. phaeocaulis is almost dry. This drying process includes evaporation at 120 °C for 30 min and cooling down.
